div:
The specification herewith documented is a working specification, and may not be used for any implementation purposes. No liability can be inferred from the use or misuse of this specification, or its consequences.
Scope
Provide access to the artefacts produced by the xShare project for supporting the Yellow Button (aka xShare button) capabilities.
Please note that this "container" is not the xShare button X-Bundle
Please refer to the X-Bundle Registry dedicated entry for consulting the xShare button X-Bundle
